item.title: Nginx - enabling SPDY with freeware certificate
item.description: I was thinking about allowing access to my website using SPDY protocol for better performance and security (and for fun of course ðŸ˜ƒ ). But SPDY have one disadvantage - you need SSL certificate signed by known authority that will verfiy in common browsers. So you can’t use self signed certificates because everyone will see a warning entering your site. Certs are quite expensive so I started searching for free one and to my surprise I found such!
